format: This data frame contains the following columns:

parameters.b1: The head breadth of the eldest son.
parameters.l2: The head length of the second son.
parameters.l1: The head length of the eldest son.
parameters.b2: The head breadth of the second son.

description:
Description
The frets data frame has 25 rows and 4 columns.
The data consist of measurements of the length and breadth of the heads of 
pairs of adult brothers in 25 randomly sampled families.  All measurements
are expressed in millimetres.
title: Head Dimensions in Brothers
